experience.description:
Optimized development processes by collaborating on backend and frontend design and coding.
Directed a team for data-driven decision-making and process enhancement. Performed bug fixes to ensure software stability and performance.
Engineered robust PostgreSQL database solutions for enhanced performance and data integrity.
Contributed actively to all phases of software releases, from planning to deployment.

Gained proficiency in Python basics and MySQL database management.
Crafted efficient codebase, following best practices in Python Django and Angular development.

projects.title: Hardware Service Management System
projects.description:
Designed and implemented a hardware service monitoring and follow-up application to streamline customer service requests for hardware devices.
Introduced features for assigning technicians, tracking progress, and providing timely updates to customers.
Enhanced business efficiency, resulting in a 20% increase in customer satisfaction.

projects.title: Point Of Sales (POS)
projects.description:
Created POS software to automate functions such as invoice generation, stock maintenance, and accounting for transactions.
Improved sales operations by streamlining transaction management and inventory handling.
Increased accounting accuracy, leading to a 25% reduction in accounting errors.

projects.title: Enquiry Track
projects.description:
Designed and developed the Enquiry Track mobile app to assist in managing clients and business activities on-the-go.
Transformed smartphones into personal sales assistants, leading to a 30% increase in sales inquiries.
Enhanced productivity, reducing response time to client inquiries by 25%.

projects.title: Ride Request System
projects.description:
This is the foundational structure for a Ride Booking System, encompassing both frontend and backend components. The system enables users to sign up, log in, and manage their profiles, facilitating the seamless request and completion of rides for a fair.
While the project is at its nascent stage, it serves as a comprehensive starting point for further enhancements and feature integrations.
Through subsequent iterations, additional functionalities, such as enhanced user authentication, robust ride management capabilities, and refined user experiences, can be developed to create a fully-fledged ride booking platform.

credits: Inspired by design concepts from Pinterest and developed using Visual Studio Code with Angular 18. Deployed with GitHub Pages. Styled with custom CSS, Bootstrap 5, and Angular Material, along with Google Fonts to create this portfolio.
